availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John A. Wornacut (Mercer County, KY, grand juror)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, carpenter and mechanic. Virginia native. Married to Martha Susan Cade Warnacut in Rockcastle County in November 1860. Father of David T. Warnacut. Carpenter in Rockcastle County in 1860. Mechanic in Rockcastle County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, p. 496.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, District 1, p. 1B.
Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Kirksville, p. 544B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Rockcastle County Marriages, 1799-1948, Film #000806409, p. 230, p. 80 of 260 of microfilm.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Rockcastle County, KY, June 1863, p. 394, p. 121 of 205 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
